articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: Szafnauer hopes “future is bright” for Alpine F1 staff - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Outgoing Alpine Formula 1 team principal Otmar Szafnauer says he hopes that the “future is bright” for the staff members he is leaving behind at Enstone and Viry-Chatillon.
articles.content:
After 18 months in charge of the team, Szafnauer completed his final weekend with Alpine at Spa on Sunday evening, following Friday's announcement of his departure.
He will be replaced on an interim… [+2089 chars]
